alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 2:29PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong and gusty thunderstorm winds will impact portions of western Arapahoe, eastern Denver and central Adams Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Manila Village, or 24 miles east of Denver, moving northeast at 20 mph. Isolated showers or thunderstorm will continue to develop in and around the Denver area this afternoon. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Denver, Aurora, Centennial, Commerce City, Littleton, Brighton, Greenwood Village, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, Bennett, Manila Village, Arapahoe Park, Strasburg, Buckley AFB, Watkins and Barr Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
